data.text: Isin yaa saawwan Baashaan kanneen Tulluu Samaariyaa irra jirtan,
Waaqayyo Gooftaan akkana jedhee  qulqullummaa isaatiin kakateera:
Buddeena raacitii qabu aarsaa galataa godhaatii gubaa;
“Ani magaalaa hunda keessatti garaa duwwaa isiniif kenneera;
“Ani yeroo midhaan haamamuuf jiʼi sadii hafutti
Uummanni bishaan barbaacha magaalaadhaa gara magaalaatti joore;
“Ani akkuman Sodoomii fi Gomoraa garagalche sana
“Kanaafuu yaa Israaʼel, ani akkanan isin godha;
